entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
